I played a bit, it's ok.

As an easy to learn but hard to master game, CS:GO is still one of the best competitive tactical shooter on the market. Graphics and mechanics are kept quite simple but thats also what makes CS iconic within the scene. Little updates or changes to the game every now and then force people to evolve new metas and keep things interesting. Even after all these years there is still new content brought to the community which shows the devs do care about the game, although ofcause not everything is perfect.
